Title: Directs the board to submit a recommendation regarding the central business district toll amounts to the legislature and recommending a privacy risk plan
Summary: Directs the board to submit a recommendation regarding the central business district toll amounts to the legislature and also to recommend a privacy risk plan.
LawCode: Amd ยง553-k, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the board submitting a recommendation regarding the central business district toll amounts to the legislature and recommending a privacy risk plan
